summary: Frontend testing of analytics dashboard UI layout with charts and number formatting across Citizen, Government, and Dealer dashboards - All features working correctly

minor.issue: 404 errors for some API calls (likely optional/non-critical endpoints)

console_warnings.issue: Chart width/height -1 warning during initial render - charts still display correctly after load

passed_tests: ✅ Citizen Dashboard loads with Welcome Banner showing user name
✅ Citizen stat cards display: ARI Score (40), Training Hours (16h), Compliance Streak (0 days), Total Spent ($1,250), Pending (0)
✅ Citizen Total Spent shows $1,250 with proper comma separator and currency symbol
✅ Citizen Activity bar chart displays with Week/Month/Year toggle buttons
✅ Citizen Spending area chart displays with $ formatting on Y-axis
✅ Citizen Purchases by Category donut chart shows percentages (45%, 25%, 20%, 10%)
✅ Citizen Training Progress horizontal bars display with percentages (100%, 75%, 50%, 25%)
✅ Citizen Compliance Checklist displays tasks with Completed/Pending status
✅ Government Dashboard loads with National Oversight title
✅ Government stat cards display: Licensed Owners (2.4M), Active Dealers (15,800), Compliance Rate (94.2%), Pending Reviews (1,247), Monthly Revenue ($4,250,000)
✅ Government Licensed Owners shows 2.4M with compact M suffix formatting
✅ Government Active Dealers shows 15,800 with comma separator
✅ Government Monthly Revenue shows $4,250,000 with proper currency formatting
✅ Government License Registrations bar chart displays with time range toggles
✅ Government Revenue Collection area chart displays with $K formatting
✅ Government Transaction Categories donut chart displays with Total 233.0K
✅ Government Regional Compliance horizontal bars display with percentages (94%, 91%, 88%, 85%, 92%)
✅ Government Alert Distribution donut chart displays with severity breakdown
✅ Government Recent Alerts section with View All Alerts button
✅ Dealer Dashboard loads with Analytics title and GPS Location Active banner
✅ Dealer stat cards display: Total Transactions (150), Pending (0), Completed (0), Rejected (0), Revenue ($26)
✅ Dealer Transactions bar chart displays with Week/Month/Year toggle
✅ Dealer Sales area chart displays with $K formatting
✅ Dealer Popular Categories donut chart displays
✅ Dealer Av. Transaction horizontal bars display with values ($450, $125, $85, $65, $175)
✅ Dealer Av. Processing Time horizontal bars display with Fast/Normal/Slow color coding
✅ All 3 dashboards use consistent professional analytics layout style
critical_code_review_comments: Number formatting utilities in /utils/formatters.js working correctly (formatNumber, formatCurrency, formatPercentage, formatCompact)
All three dashboards now use consistent professional analytics layout with Recharts
Chart data (activityByMonth, spendingByMonth, registrationsByMonth, revenueByMonth) is MOCKED/generated client-side for demo purposes as noted in requirements

citizen.login_method: Click Member Access -> Click Citizen demo button

admin.login_method: Click Government button -> Click Admin demo button

dealer.login_method: Click Dealer Portal button -> Click Dealer demo button

context_for_next_testing_agent: All three dashboards (Citizen, Government, Dealer) now have consistent professional analytics layout with Recharts. Number formatting utilities in /utils/formatters.js are working correctly - formatNumber adds comma separators, formatCurrency adds $ symbol and commas, formatPercentage adds %, formatCompact adds K/M/B suffixes. Chart data is MOCKED for demo (activityByMonth, spendingByMonth, registrationsByMonth, revenueByMonth generated client-side).
mocked_data_note: As noted in requirements, chart data is partially generated on frontend for demo purposes: activityByMonth, spendingByMonth, registrationsByMonth, revenueByMonth are generated client-side with random values.
